name: ListParticipant
description: Retrieve a list of participants belonging to the account used to make the request

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Participant resources to read.

ConferenceSid.description: The SID of the conference with the participants to read.

Muted.description: Whether to return only participants that are muted. Can be: `true` or `false`.

Hold.description: Whether to return only participants that are on hold. Can be: `true` or `false`.

Coaching.description: Whether to return only participants who are coaching another call. Can be: `true` or `false`.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
